title: The game won't open :(
body: I'm not sure if this is because of the computer or the client. I play on a Mac. But whenever I click on the game, it doesn't open. By this I mean I double click on it, it shows a quick open animation, but the client never shows up. Does this ever happen to anyone else?

replies.body: Your connection might be having some trouble reaching the login server, so the patcher can't load.  Try out the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a resolution.  Be sure to select Mac for steps specific to your OS.  Hope it helps!
